item.title: Morsels adds Xbox Series version; PC demo now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/morsels-adds-xbox-series-version-pc-demo-now-available

Top-down roguelike shooter Morsels will be available for Xbox Series alongside its previously announced PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam) versions when it launches in 2025, publisher Annapurna Interactive and developer Furcula announced.

A demo is available now for PC via Steam as part of Steam Next Fest: June 2025 Edition. The demo features the following content:

  • The first world, Big City
  • The first boss cat, Baron Ginger
  • The first five playable morsels
  • A little side quest and a secret bonus level
  • A handful of unlockable upgrades
  • Interesting nooks and crannies to explore

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Annapurna Interactive:

About

Morsels is a strange game of juxtapositions—colorful charm is contrasted by sludgy environments, while Morsels can be strengthened or hindered by quirks in a balancing act. With art from developer Toby Dixon (Nidhogg 2, Atomicrops), Morsels’ distinct visual flair helps enhance its already innovative creature collection elements to create a fresh feeling roguelite.

Key Features

  • Fight enemies using your rotating roster of captured Morsels, switching between them at any time.
  • Multiple hidden bonus levels with unique art styles and surprising gameplay twists.
  • Charming and gripping gameplay, with endless replayability.

item.title: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls DLC character Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) launches June 10 for Season Pass owners, June 17 for all
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/bleach-rebirth-of-souls-dlc-character-ichigo-kurosaki-thousand-year-blood-war-arc-launches-june-10-for-season-pass-owners-june-17-for-all

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Ranked Matchmaking Mode due out later today.

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls downloadable content character Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) will launch on June 10 for Season Pass owners and June 17 for everyone, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Tamsoft announced.

Additionally, the free version 1.10 update, which implements Ranked Matchmaking Mode, will launch later today.

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: The Legend of Zelda live-action film delayed to May 7, 2027
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/the-legend-of-zelda-live-action-film-delayed-to-may-7-2027

No longer due out on March 27, 2027.

Nintendo has delayed the release of the live-action The Legend of Zelda film from its previously planned March 26, 2027 premiere date to May 7, 2027, the company announced.

“This is [Shigeru] Miyamoto,” The Legend of Zelda creator Shigeru Miyamoto said in a tweet. “For production reasons, we are changing the release date of the live-action film of The Legend of Zelda to May 7, 2027. It will be some weeks later than the release timing we originally announced, and we will take the extra time to make the film as good as it can be. Thank you for your patience.”
